name: chatgpt-helper
description: Make queries to OpenAI's ChatGPT from inside VS Code.

commands.title: ChatGPT: Ask why code isn't working

chatgptHelper.queries.queryCodeNotWorkin.default: Explain what is wrong with the following code:
chatgptHelper.queries.queryCodeNotWorkin.description: The query to send to ChatGPT when asking what is wrong with code. Will be sent alongside (before) the code.

chatgptHelper.queries.queryExplainCode.description: The query to send to ChatGPT when asking to explain code. Will be sent alongside (before) the code.

chatgptHelper.sessionToken.markdownDescription: Session token for ChatGPT. To find, go to [chat.openai.com/chat](https://chat.openai.com/chat). Press `Ctrl`+`Shift`+`I` (or `Command`+`Option`+`I` on Mac). Open Applications > Cookies > `https://chat.openai.com`. Copy the value of the `__Secure-next-auth.session-token` and paste it here.
